thread.title: Chap from Beds
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Chap from Beds

author: Chap from Beds
title: Chap from Beds
text:
The whole service worked really well, the installer Steve was polite, called me to let me know he was 40 mins away or so. He did a cracking job of fitting my two tyres and for the best price I could find too.
Would use again and recommend without a moments hesitation.
